attributes.action: require all police officers to wear bright pink fluffy hats
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By requiring all cops to wear these hats, it will be much easier to tell the difference between them, traffic wardens, and council workers.  This could prove beneficial in situations when a police officer needs to be identified quickly.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
